00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "MsqGeomPrim.hpp"

00036 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00037 
00038 bool MsqLine::intersect( const MsqLine& other, double& param, double epsilon ) const
00039 {
00040   if (!closest( other, param ))
00041     return false;
00042   Vector3D p1 = point(param);
00043   Vector3D p2 = other.point(other.closest(p1));
00044   return (p1 - p2).length_squared() < epsilon*epsilon;
00045 }
00046   
00047 
00048 bool MsqLine::closest( const MsqLine& other, double& param ) const
00049 {
00050   const Vector3D N = other.direction() * (direction() * other.direction());
00051   const double D = -(N % other.point());
00052   const double dot = N % direction();
00053   if (dot < DBL_EPSILON)
00054     return false; // parallel
00055   param = -(N % point() + D) / dot;
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058   
00059 bool MsqCircle::three_point( const Vector3D& p1, 
00060                              const Vector3D& p2, 
00061                              const Vector3D& p3, 
00062                              MsqCircle& result )
00063 {
00064   Vector3D norm = (p1 - p2) * (p3 - p2);
00065   if (norm.length_squared() < DBL_EPSILON)
00066     return false;
00067   
00068   MsqLine line1( 0.5*(p1+p2), norm * (p1 - p2) );
00069   MsqLine line2( 0.5*(p2+p3), norm * (p3 - p2) );
00070   double t_xsect;
00071   if (!line1.closest( line2, t_xsect ))
00072     return false;
00073   
00074   Vector3D center = line1.point(t_xsect);
00075   double radius = ((center - p1).length() +
00076                    (center - p2).length() +
00077                    (center - p3).length()) / 3.0;
00078   result = MsqCircle( center, norm, radius );
00079   return true;
00080 }
00081   
00082       
00083 bool MsqCircle::two_point( const Vector3D& center, 
00084                            const Vector3D& p1, 
00085                            const Vector3D& p2, 
00086                            MsqCircle& result )
00087 {
00088   Vector3D norm = (p1 - center) * (p2 - center);
00089   if (norm.length_squared() < DBL_EPSILON)
00090     return false;
00091   
00092   double radius = 0.5 * ((center - p1).length() + (center - p2).length());  
00093   result = MsqCircle( center, norm, radius );
00094   return true;
00095 }
00096 
00097 Vector3D MsqCircle::radial_vector() const
00098 {
00099   int min_idx = 0;
00100   if (normal()[1] < normal()[min_idx])
00101     min_idx = 1;
00102   if (normal()[2] < normal()[min_idx])
00103     min_idx = 2;
00104   Vector3D vect(0,0,0);
00105   vect[min_idx] = 1;
00106   vect = normal() * vect;
00107   vect *= radius() / vect.length();
00108   return vect;
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 Vector3D MsqCircle::closest( const Vector3D& point ) const
00113 {
00114   const Vector3D from_center = point - center();
00115   const Vector3D norm_proj = normal() * (normal() % from_center); // unit normal!
00116   const Vector3D in_plane = from_center - norm_proj;
00117   const double length = in_plane.length();
00118   if (length < DBL_EPSILON) 
00119     return center() + radial_vector();
00120   else
00121     return center() + in_plane * radius() / length;
00122 }
00123 
00124 bool MsqCircle::closest( const Vector3D& point,
00125                          Vector3D& result_pt,
00126                          Vector3D& result_tngt ) const
00127 {
00128   const Vector3D from_center = point - center();
00129   Vector3D in_plane = from_center - (from_center % normal());
00130   if (in_plane.length_squared() < DBL_EPSILON)
00131     return false;
00132   
00133   result_pt = center() + in_plane * radius() / in_plane.length();
00134   result_tngt = in_plane * normal();
00135   return true;
00136 }
00137 
00138 MsqPlane::MsqPlane( const Vector3D& normal, double coeff )
00139 {
00140   const double len = normal.length();
00141   mNormal = normal / len;
00142   mCoeff = coeff / len;
00143 }
00144 
00145 MsqPlane::MsqPlane( const Vector3D& normal, const Vector3D& point )
00146   : mNormal( normal / normal.length() ), mCoeff( -(mNormal % point) )
00147 {
00148 }
00149 
00150 MsqPlane::MsqPlane( double a, double b, double c, double d )
00151   : mNormal(a,b,c), mCoeff(d)
00152 {
00153   const double len = mNormal.length();
00154   mNormal /= len;
00155   mCoeff /= len;
00156 }

00158 
00159 bool MsqPlane::intersect( const MsqPlane& plane, MsqLine& result ) const
00160 {
00161   const double dot = normal() % plane.normal();
00162   const double det = dot*dot - 1.0;
00163   if (fabs(det) < DBL_EPSILON) // parallel
00164     return false;
00165   
00166   const double s1 = (coefficient() - dot*plane.coefficient()) / det;
00167   const double s2 = (plane.coefficient() - dot*coefficient()) / det;
00168   result = MsqLine( s1*normal() + s2*plane.normal(), normal() * plane.normal() );
00169   return true;
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 bool MsqPlane::intersect( const MsqLine& line, double& result ) const
00174 {
00175   const double dot = line.direction() % normal();
00176   if (fabs(dot) < DBL_EPSILON)
00177     return false;
00178   
00179   result = -(normal() % line.point() + coefficient()) / dot;
00180   return true;
00181 }
00182 
00183 Vector3D MsqSphere::closest( const Vector3D& point ) const
00184 {
00185   Vector3D diff = point - center();
00186   double len = diff.length();
00187   if (len < DBL_EPSILON) {
00188     // pick any point
00189     diff = Vector3D(1,0,0);
00190     len = 1;
00191   }
00192   
00193   return center() + diff * radius() / len;
00194 }
00195 
00196 bool MsqSphere::closest( const Vector3D& point, 
00197                          Vector3D& point_on_sphere,
00198                          Vector3D& normal_at_point ) const
00199 {
00200   normal_at_point = point - center();
00201   double len = normal_at_point.length();
00202   if (len < DBL_EPSILON) 
00203     return false;
00204   
00205   normal_at_point /= len;
00206   point_on_sphere = center() + radius() * normal_at_point;
00207   return true;
00208 }
00209               
00210 bool MsqSphere::intersect( const MsqPlane& plane, MsqCircle& result ) const
00211 {
00212   const Vector3D plane_pt = plane.closest( center() );
00213   const Vector3D plane_dir = plane_pt - center();
00214   const double dir_sqr = plane_dir.length_squared();
00215   if (dir_sqr < DBL_EPSILON) { // plane passes through center of sphere
00216     result = MsqCircle( center(), plane.normal(), radius() );
00217     return true;
00218   }
00219   
00220   double rad_sqr = radius()*radius() - plane_dir.length_squared();
00221   if (rad_sqr < 0) // no intersection
00222     return false;
00223   
00224   result = MsqCircle( plane_pt, plane_dir, sqrt(rad_sqr) );
00225   return true;
00226 }
00227 
00228 bool MsqSphere::intersect( const MsqSphere& sphere, MsqCircle& result ) const
00229 {
00230   const Vector3D d = sphere.center() - center();
00231   const double dist = d.length();
00232   if (dist > (radius() + sphere.radius()))
00233     return false;
00234   
00235   const double r1_sqr = radius()*radius();
00236   const double r2_sqr = sphere.radius() * sphere.radius();
00237   const double f = (d % d + r1_sqr - r2_sqr) / 2;
00238   //const double d1 = f / dist;
00239   
00240   const double rad = sqrt( r1_sqr - f*f/(d % d) );
00241   Vector3D c = center() + d * f / (d % d);
00242   result = MsqCircle( c, d, rad );
00243   return true;
00244 }
